metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010319 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: WavPack 5.1.0 and earlier is affected by: CWE-457: Use of UninitializedVariable. The impact is: Unexpected control flow, crashes, and segfaults.The component is: ParseWave64HeaderConfig (wave64.c:211). The attack vectoris: Maliciously crafted .wav file. The fixed version is: After commithttps://github.com/dbry/WavPack/commit/33a0025d1d63ccd05d9dbaa6923d52b1446a62fe.

criterions.comment: wavpack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
